messages.title: The Lib Dem Difference
messages.content: The Lib Dems have a costed plan to protect NHS frontline services, put 3,000 more police on patrol and cut tax by £700 for millions of people across Britain. They will also restore the earnings link for pensions and give our armed forces fair pay.

messages.title: WINNING for Britain
messages.content: The Lib Dems share power in Birmingham and run many big cities like Liverpool, Sheffield and Bristol. Won more votes than Labour in the last set of elections. Are stronger now than at any time since 1922. We can deliver real change.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket
keyPolicies.policyDescription: You will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair chance for every child
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Smaller class sizes, £2.5 billion extra for schools and scrap university tuition fees.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair future: create jobs by making Britain greener
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient affordable homes.
Make politicians accountable and give YOU the right to sack corrupt MPs.

issues.economy: We are the only party with a plan to balance the books after the recession. Labour and Tories just make promises they rarely keep.
issues.education: Smaller class sizes, £2.5 billion extra for schools.
issues.environment: Invest in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient affordable homes.
issues.governance: Make politicians accountable and give YOU the right to sack corrupt MPs.
issues.health: The Lib Dems have a costed plan to protect NHS frontline services.
issues.socialWelfare: They will also restore the earnings link for pensions and give our armed forces fair pay.

quotes.text: Nick Clegg says: 'We can make these pledges because we have identified savings we can make to balance the books and pay for it.'

images.caption: Four steps to a fairer Britain.
